'''Maple Wood''' is obtained by cutting down Amur Maple in [[Yashiori Island]] and [[Ritou]]. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Maple Wood can be found around the [[Statue of The Seven]] of Yashiori Island. The trees only grow in the yellow area in the central region of the island. They can also be found all around Ritou.

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=218 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
